item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: g81
item.content:encoded: Welcome to Starter Templates Sites. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: katy
item.content:encoded:
Know Your Home from Roof to Foundation

Professional Home Inspections in San Antonio, Austin, San Marcos, Spring Branch, and Central Texas.

100+ ReviewS

Licensed & Certified

100% Satisfied clients

The wrong inspector can miss problems that drain your wallet later.

One overlooked issue, like hidden water damage, faulty wiring, or a cracked foundation, can turn your dream home into a money pit. Since youre investing so much into your purchase, you deserve an inspection that catches what really matters.

We help homeowners, buyers, sellers, and real estate professionals get clear, comprehensive inspection reports they can trust.

  • No rushed checklists
  • No overlooked details

Just honest reporting from a licensed, experienced team you can rely on.

Thorough inspections

Same-day reports

Realtor-approved

Competitive rates

Home Inspections Tailored To You

No matter the property size or condition, we bring expertise and attention to detail to every inspection. Whether its a starter home, new construction, or a commercial space, weve got you covered.

Spaces/Systems We Inspect

Roofs & Attics

Plumbing Systems

Electrical Systems

HVAC Systems

Foundations & Structures

Interiors & Exteriors

Types of Inspections We Offer

  • Buyers Inspection
  • Sellers Pre-Listing Inspections
  • New Construction Inspections
  • Commercial Property Inspections
  • Termite / WDI Inspections
  • Pool & Spa Inspections

Go from property hunting to smart buying with ease

1. Book Your Inspection

Request a quote and lock in your inspection date; well handle the scheduling details.

2. We Inspect Thoroughly

On inspection day, we show up on time and carefully check every major system of the home.

3. Get a clear report

Within 24 hours, youll have a detailed, easy-to-read report that gives you confidence in your decision.

Inspection Results

We dont just inspect homes, we give buyers and sellers peace of mind. Here are a few examples of what our clients discovered thanks to our inspections:

Got Questions?

Were happy to help. If you cant find the info youre looking for, please dont hesitate to reach out to us!

Call us (555) 123-4567

Answer goes here.

Answer goes here.

Answer goes here.

Answer goes here.

Answer goes here.

Answer goes here.

Ready to Buy or Sell with Confidence?

Dont risk your biggest investment on an incomplete inspection. Lets get it right the first time with detailed reports, fast turnaround, and results you can trust.

Fill out the form. One of our reps will reach out to get your inspection scheduled.

Your partner for thorough, reliable home inspections.

Call us (555) 123-4567

info@clearviewinspections.com

Navigate

  • Home
  • About
  • Services
  • Testimonials
  • FAQ
  • Contact

Areas We Serve

Serving Greater Central TX

  • San Antonio
  • Austin
  • San Marcos
  • Spring Branch
  • New Braunfels
  • Surrounding Areas
